answer:
1. There seems to be a correlation between IMDB rating and worldwide_gross. 
2. Science fiction and superhero movies made huge amount of money in the USA as well as world-wide. 
3. Fantasy and Factual movies seems to be much longer than the other types but they also make more money. 
4. Movies directed by James Cameron which had an imdb rating between 8-9 were successful with huge world-wide gross.

5. Walt Disney Picture has highest production budgets.
